content.text:
[@crypt](@3/5QwIQvjiTEntCyMReGtRNkdHtAUmqvhQ2mIkFQSYo=.ed25519) 

One cool bit is that we don't even need everyone to support Dat, we'd just need one client that can speak both the [non-existent] Dat protocol as well as the already-existing [Scuttlebutt protocol](https://ssbc.github.io/scuttlebutt-protocol-guide/). We'd just need a way to create/read messages from a Dat arhive, right?
